shortdesc.ph: Checks whether the speakerphone is enabled.
Checks whether the speakerphone is enabled.
Checks whether the speakerphone is enabled.

section.note: This method is applicable only on Android and iOS.
This method is for Android and iOS only.

section.title: Timing
section.p: This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

ul.li: : The speakerphone is enabled, and audio is routed to the speaker.
: The speakerphone is not enabled, and audio is routed to a non-speaker device (earpiece, headset, etc.).
: The speakerphone is enabled, and audio is routed to the speaker.
: The speakerphone is not enabled, and audio is routed to a non-speaker device (earpiece, headset, etc.).
: The speakerphone is enabled, and audio is routed to the speaker.
: The speakerphone is not enabled, and audio is routed to a non-speaker device (earpiece, headset, etc.).
